name:
Professor Layton
and the Miracle Mask
formal_name:
Professor Layton
and the Miracle Mask
description:
The fifth game in the series features
150 brand new brainteasers and a
new set of three minigames courtesy
of the Professor’s Trunk. Professor
Layton and the Miracle Mask also
boasts 365 additional Daily Puzzles
distributed via the Nintendo Network –
one puzzle a day for a whole year
from the day of the game’s launch.
